# Kevin Gerges - Software Engineer

> Software Engineer at Meta building privacy-compliant infrastructure and AI-powered automation.

## About
Kevin Gerges is a Software Engineer at Meta and Computer Science graduate from USC. He builds software that understands people, designing systems that model human thoughtâ€”how we remember, search, and construct meaning.

## Current Role
- **Company**: Meta
- **Position**: Software Engineer
- **Focus**: Privacy Engineering, AI/ML, Data Pipelines, Infrastructure
- **Location**: Menlo Park, CA
